CustomField.description: Defines how this capability is implemented. 'Standard' uses a built-in framework action. 'Apex' uses a custom Apex class that implements the IAgentAction interface. 'Flow' uses a Salesforce Flow. 'Graph' uses advanced graph-based processing.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose the implementation method: 'Standard' for built-in actions, 'Apex' for custom code, 'Flow' for Salesforce Flows, or 'Graph' for advanced graph processing.
CustomField.label: Implementation Type
